alert.note: Alert for Southern Seward Peninsula Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 09 at 1:06PM AKST until March 11 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO 6 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern Seward Peninsula Coast. * WHEN...From 6 AM Thursday to 6 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will increase tonight, with the strongest winds starting Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
